overview: A film composed from mobile phone footage shot by immigrant workers on building sites in and around Mecca from 2008–2013, during some of the most seismic redevelopments of the city. Most of the footage was shot for the benefit of these workers’ families. The files transferred to the artist’s phone using Bluetooth, while other materials were originally uploaded to YouTube. Some contributors have asked to remain anonymous.
title: Leaves Fall in All Seasons
